tool.name: OGS: ComputeNodeAreasFromSurfaceMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'ComputeNodeAreasFromSurfaceMesh'.
tool.command: for i in $mesh_input_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; ComputeNodeAreasFromSurfaceMesh --mesh-input-file '$mesh_input_file.element_identifier' --id-prop-name '$id_prop_name' --output-base-name output_

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: Input (.vtu). the file containing the input mesh

param.name: id_prop_name
param.label: id prop name
param.help: the property containing the id information

tool.help: This tool runs the **ComputeNodeAreasFromSurfaceMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
